directions.text: Roll thin slices of mozzarella out between towels to dry out.
Heat oil in a large skillet over medium high heat.
Saute garlic and pepper flakes for 1 min.
Add tomatoes and mushrooms and cook for 12 mins.
Off heat stir in 2 TBSP of pesto and the salt and pepper.
Spread pesto on the inside of each roll.
Then pack all ingredients into the sandwiches.
cook on a greased sheet in the oven for 5 mins.
